comments:
OS: Windows XP with SP2
Language: English
Build: epf-composer-1.0-M4-N20060728-1650
	    
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create an element, input some items to generate XMI files, save it and add to CC source control
2. Try to delete/move/rename this element, an error message popup:
   Cannot check out parent directory "D:\CCView1\JXVob\CC01\Test-Plugin\roles"

Expected Result:
Delete/move/rename elements under CC source control correctly

Remark:
1. CCRC Version: CCRC 7.0.1
please verify this. Should users do a find all and check in everything before the deletion?

(In reply to comment #1)
> please verify this. Should users do a find all and check in everything before
> the deletion?

Yes, I can check in every element and perform find all before the deletion.

I tried to delete/move/rename a role, which seems working ok.

Some refresh issue happens sometimes, with the following errors in the log.
when it happens, the lib view is gone, and has to reopen the lib to see the changes.
